meanings.definition: Involving or relating to multiple countries.
meanings.sent1: The multicountries agreement was signed by many nations.
meanings.sent2: She studied multicountries trade for her research project.
meanings.sent3: The multicountries conference had interpreters for every language.
meanings.sent4: Their multicountries partnership spanned continents and cultures.
meanings.sent5: The multicountries summit aimed to promote global cooperation.

meanings.sent1: The multicountries in the alliance worked together for peace.
meanings.sent2: He visited several multicountries during his world tour.
meanings.sent3: The multicountries at the United Nations had diverse flags.
meanings.sent4: Their multicountries coalition was a force to be reckoned with.
meanings.sent5: The multicountries border was a meeting point of different cultures.
